title: Access to the Career Fair Dinner
description: Talk with companies looking for CS students the night of the Career Fair for longer than a 2-minute elevator pitch.

title: Exclusive Discounts
description: Receive over $25 in discounts at some of ACM's most popular events including MegaMiner AI, Cyberboot Camp, and more!

title: Members T-Shirt
description: Receive our members-only t-shirt designed every year by students in September.
